aume.daill@...> wrote:
>
> Hi everybody
> 
> I have downloaded the cantera'=
s latest version (1.7) in order to
> install it under UNIX.
> I want to use=
 the python interface.
> 
> The compilation and installation occur without =
problems. To test my

mport Cantera :
> 
> from cantera import *
> 
> When I execute it, I've the=
 following error :
>

>=

> =

> The only difference I see between 1.6 and 1.7 is the directory:
> 
> /PA=
THTOCANTERA/Cantera/python/build/lib.linux-i686-2.2/Cantera
> In version 1.=
7 there is not the library _cantera.so
> So this file, isn't installed in m=
y python package

ra.so 's 1.6
> version in the 1.7 folder, my script (from cantera import *)=
 works fine.
